summary_text: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: Baywatch
summary_text: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
summary_text: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2016 Marvel film 'Doctor Strange'.

name: 13 Reasons Why
summary_text: Follows teenager Clay Jensen, in his quest to uncover the story behind his classmate and crush, Hannah, and her decision to end her life.

name: How to Get Away with Murder
summary_text: A group of ambitious law students and their brilliant criminal defense professor become involved in a twisted murder plot that promises to change the course of their lives.

name: Edge of the World
summary_text: The adventures of Sir James Brooke, who defied the British Empire to rule a jungle kingdom in 1840s Borneo, embarked on a lifelong crusade to end piracy, slavery and head-hunting, and inspired LORD JIM and THE MAN WHO WOULD BE KING.

name: Star Trek: The Original Series
summary_text: In the 23rd Century, Captain James T. Kirk and the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise explore the galaxy and defend the United Federation of Planets.

name: Final Space
summary_text: An astronaut named Gary and his planet-destroying sidekick called Mooncake embark on serialized journeys through space in order to unlock the mystery of where the universe actually ends and if it actually does exist.

name: The West Wing
summary_text: Inside the lives of staffers in the West Wing of the White House.

name: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
summary_text: Lawman Luke Hobbs (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) and outcast Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham) form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.

name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
summary_text: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

name: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
summary_text: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2018 film 'Venom'.

name: Occupation: Rainfall
summary_text: Two years after aliens land on Earth, survivors from Sydney, Australia, fight in a desperate war as the number of casualties continue to grow.

name: Black Panther
summary_text: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

name: Chuck
summary_text: When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.

name: Aquaman
summary_text: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

name: Entourage
summary_text: Film star Vince Chase navigates the vapid terrain of Los Angeles with a close circle of friends and his trusty agent.

name: Rizzoli & Isles
summary_text: Detective Jane Rizzoli and Chief Medical Examiner Dr. Maura Isles team up to solve crimes in Boston.

name: Alien
summary_text: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
summary_text: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

name: The Devil Wears Prada
summary_text: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

name: Evil
summary_text: A skeptical female clinical psychologist joins a priest-in-training and a blue-collar contractor as they investigate supposed miracles, demonic possession, and other extraordinary occurrences to see if there's a scientific explanation or if something truly supernatural is at work.

name: Bridesmaids
summary_text: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

name: The Princess Bride
summary_text: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

name: Your Honor
summary_text: A judge confronts his convictions when his son is involved in a hit and run that embroils an organized crime family. Facing impossible choices, he discovers how far a father will go to save his son's life.

name: The Americans
summary_text: At the height of the Cold War two Russian agents pose as your average American couple, complete with family.

name: Dune
summary_text: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
summary_text: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

name: Malcolm in the Middle
summary_text: A gifted young teen tries to survive life with his dimwitted, dysfunctional family.

name: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
summary_text: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.

name: Law & Order: Organized Crime
summary_text: Elliot Stabler returns to the NYPD to battle organized crime after a devastating personal loss.

name: Twilight
summary_text: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
summary_text: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

name: Snowpiercer
summary_text: Seven years after the world has become a frozen wasteland, the remnants of humanity inhabit a perpetually-moving train that circles the globe, where class warfare, social injustice and the politics of survival play out.

name: After
summary_text: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

name: Foundation
summary_text: A complex saga of humans scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

name: Boardwalk Empire
summary_text: An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.

name: Unhinged
summary_text: After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.

name: Silent Witness
summary_text: Crimes through the eyes of a team of forensic pathologists and forensic scientists.

name: The Devil All the Time
summary_text: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.

name: Trouble
summary_text: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.

name: Captain Marvel
summary_text: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

name: The Leftovers
summary_text: Three years after the disappearance of two percent of the global population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event.

name: The Green Mile
summary_text: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

name: Road to Perdition
summary_text: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

name: The Man in the High Castle
summary_text: In a dystopian America dominated by Nazi Germany and Imperial Japan, a young woman discovers a mysterious film that may hold the key to toppling the totalitarian regimes.

name: The Chosen
summary_text: A charismatic fisherman drowning in debt. A troubled woman wrestling with real demons. A young tax collector ostracized by society. A religious leader questioning his faith tradition.

name: The Shining
summary_text: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

name: The Orville
summary_text: An exploratory ship from Earth faces intergalactic challenges 400 years in the future.

name: Little House on the Prairie
summary_text: The life and adventures of the Ingalls family in the nineteenth century American Midwest.

name: Mom
summary_text: A newly sober single mom tries to pull her life together in Napa Valley while dealing with her wayward mother.

name: Last Night in Soho
summary_text: A young girl, passionate about fashion design, is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters her idol, a dazzling wannabe singer. But 1960s London is not what it seems, and time seems to fall apart with shady consequences.

name: Notting Hill
summary_text: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

name: Zola
summary_text: A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida.

name: I, Tonya
summary_text: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary_text: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

name: FBI
summary_text: Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.

name: Doom Patrol
summary_text: The adventures of an idealistic mad scientist and his field team of superpowered outcasts.

name: Léon: The Professional
summary_text: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

name: Birds of Prey
summary_text: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
summary_text: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

name: Reminiscence
summary_text: A scientist discovers a way to relive your past and uses the technology to search for his long lost love.

name: Scarface
summary_text: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

name: Naruto: Shippûden
summary_text: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

name: What We Do in the Shadows
summary_text: A look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of three vampires, who've lived together for over 100 years, on Staten Island.

name: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
summary_text: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

name: Silver Skates
summary_text: The 20th century is just around the corner. In winter, St. Petersburg transforms into a fairy tale-like wonderland where frozen rivers and canals serve as the iced-over roads and bustle ...                See full summary »

name: The Curse of La Llorona
summary_text: Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother suspected of child endangerment, a social worker and her own small kids are soon drawn into a frightening supernatural realm.

name: The Good Fight
summary_text: When Diane Lockhart's life savings are lost, she must start from scratch at a new firm.

name: Baby Driver
summary_text: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

name: Basic Instinct
summary_text: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

name: The Blue Lagoon
summary_text: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

name: John Wick: Chapter 4
summary_text: The continuing adventures of assassin John Wick.

name: Superbad
summary_text: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

name: American Beauty
summary_text: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
summary_text: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: White Collar
summary_text: A white-collar criminal agrees to help the FBI catch other white-collar criminals using his expertise as an art and securities thief, counterfeiter, and conman.

name: Annabelle: Creation
summary_text: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

name: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
summary_text: An intimate look at the extraordinary rise, fall and redemption of televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker.

name: Hunter x Hunter
summary_text: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

name: Watchmen
summary_text: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

name: Mystic River
summary_text: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

name: Whitstable Pearl
summary_text: Follows local restaurant owner Pearl Nolan who sets up a local detective agency after undergoing police training in an earlier career. She is soon embroiled in her first case when she discovers the body of close friend, Vinnie.

name: Z Nation
summary_text: Three years after the zombie virus has gutted the United States of America a team of everyday heroes must transport the only known survivor of the plague from New York to California, where the last functioning viral lab waits for his blood.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
summary_text: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

name: Blindspot
summary_text: Jane Doe is found in Times Square with no memory and mysterious tattoos on her body.

name: Motherland
summary_text: This is a programme about navigating the trials and traumas of middle-class motherhood, looking at the competitive side and unromantic take on parenting - not the cute and acceptable public face of motherhood.

name: HouseBroken
summary_text: A dog named Honey who runs group therapy sessions to help neighborhood animals manage the neuroses brought on by their owners and each other.

name: Shazam!
summary_text: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

name: The Marksman
summary_text: A rancher on the Arizona border becomes the unlikely defender of a young Mexican boy desperately fleeing the cartel assassins who've pursued him into the U.S.

name: Mean Girls
summary_text: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

name: Heat
summary_text: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

name: City on a Hill
summary_text: In early 1990s Boston, ADA Decourcy Ward forms an unlikely alliance with a corrupt venerated FBI veteran, Jackie Rohr. Together, they take on a case that changes the city's entire criminal justice system.

name: Person of Interest
summary_text: An ex-CIA agent and a wealthy programmer save lives via a surveillance AI that sends them the identities of civilians involved in impending crimes. However, the details of the crimes, including the civilians' roles, are left a mystery.

name: Captain America: The First Avenger
summary_text: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

name: A Clockwork Orange
summary_text: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

name: Barry
summary_text: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

name: Prisoners
summary_text: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

name: In the Earth
summary_text: As the world searches for a cure to a disastrous virus, a scientist and park scout venture deep in the forest for a routine equipment run.

name: Call Me by Your Name
summary_text: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

name: Grace and Frankie
summary_text: Finding out that their husbands are not just work partners, but have also been romantically involved for the last twenty years, two women with an already strained relationship try to cope with the circumstances together.

name: Normal People
summary_text: Follows Marianne and Connell, from different backgrounds but the same small town in Ireland, as they weave in and out of each other's romantic lives.

name: Start-Up
summary_text: Young entrepreneurs aspiring to launch virtual dreams into reality compete for success and love in the cutthroat world of Korea's high-tech industry.

name: American Psycho
summary_text: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

name: Furious 7
summary_text: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

name: Jungle Cruise
summary_text: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.

name: Superman
summary_text: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

name: Whiplash
summary_text: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

name: Untitled Horror Movie
summary_text: A comedy about making a horror movie. When six co-stars learn their hit TV show is about to be canceled, they decide to shoot their own film, unintentionally summoning a spirit with an affinity for violence.

name: Hannibal
summary_text: Explores the early relationship between renowned psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter and a young FBI criminal profiler who is haunted by his ability to empathize with serial killers.

name: Apocalypse Now
summary_text: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

name: Silicon Valley
summary_text: Follows the struggle of Richard Hendricks, a Silicon Valley engineer trying to build his own company called Pied Piper.

name: Raised by Wolves
summary_text: Androids are tasked with raising human children on a mysterious planet.

name: Run
summary_text: A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.

name: Perry Mason
summary_text: The cases of a master criminal defense attorney, handling the most difficult of cases in the aid of the innocent.

name: Sleepers
summary_text: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

name: The Fate of the Furious
summary_text: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

name: Atypical
summary_text: Sam, an 18-year-old on the autism spectrum, decides it's time to find a girlfriend, a journey that sets Sam's mom on her own life-changing path as her son seeks more independence.

name: Little Women
summary_text: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

name: Good Witch
summary_text: "Good Witch" will take viewers on a new magical journey with Cassie Nightingale and her daughter Grace. When Dr. Sam Radford moves in next door to Grey House with his son, they are charmed by the 'magical' mother-daughter duo.

name: Doctor Zhivago
summary_text: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

name: The Golden Girls
summary_text: Four previously married women live together in Miami, sharing their various experiences together and enjoying themselves despite hard times. Spin-offs Nurses (1991) and Empty Nest (1988).

name: Top Gun
summary_text: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

name: Pitch Perfect
summary_text: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

name: Bohemian Rhapsody
summary_text: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

name: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
summary_text: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
summary_text: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

name: American Gods
summary_text: A recently released ex-convict named Shadow meets a mysterious man who calls himself "Wednesday" and who knows more than he first seems to about Shadow's life and past.

name: Ford v Ferrari
summary_text: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

name: The Owl House
summary_text: Accidentally sent to the world of the Boiling Isles before a trip to summer camp, a teenage human named Luz longs to become a witch, with the rebellious Eda and pint-sized demon King at her aid.

name: The Outsider
summary_text: Investigators are confounded over an unspeakable crime that's been committed.

name: Stowaway
summary_text: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the lives of everyone on board.

name: Them
summary_text: A Black family moves to an all-white Los Angeles neighborhood where malevolent forces, next door and otherworldly, threaten to taunt, ravage and destroy them.

name: Lolita
summary_text: An English professor falls for a minor , and has to face the consequences of his actions.

name: Gully
summary_text: Three teens living in LA, all victims of extreme childhoods, wreak a hedonistic riot across the city over the course of 48 hours, unbound by societal norms. They take us on a rip-roaring ride of drugs and murder across Los Angeles.

name: Smother
summary_text: On the rugged coast of County Clare, Val Ahern's husband is found dead at the foot of a cliff the morning after a family party. The matriarch starts to dig into the family's secrets to find out who might be responsible.

name: Godfather of Harlem
summary_text: A gangster named Bumpy Johnson makes his way in Harlem during the 1960s. A TV prequel to the 2007 film, 'American Gangster', which centered on the criminal enterprise of Frank Lucas.

name: Fleabag
summary_text: A comedy series adapted from the award-winning play about a young woman trying to cope with life in London whilst coming to terms with a recent tragedy.

name: Palm Springs
summary_text: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

name: Designated Survivor
summary_text: A low-level Cabinet member becomes President of the United States after a catastrophic attack kills everyone above him in the line of succession.

name: Mulan
summary_text: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father.

name: Minari
summary_text: A Korean family starts a farm in 1980s Arkansas.

name: Motherland: Fort Salem
summary_text: A trio of witches is trained to become powerful weapons for the American military.

name: Mayans M.C.
summary_text: Set in a post-Jax Teller world, "Mayans MC" sees EZ Reyes, a former golden boy now fresh out of prison, as a prospect in the Mayan MC charter on the California-Mexico border who must carve out his new outlaw identity.

name: Oslo
summary_text: Recounts the true-life, previously secret, back-channel negotiations in the development of the pivotal 1990s Oslo Peace Accords between Israel and the Palestinian Liberation Organization.

name: Aspirants
summary_text: It is the story of the journey of three UPSC (public service competitive exams in India) aspirants and their friendship against all odds.

name: Gangs of London
summary_text: Tells the story of London being torn apart by the turbulent power struggles of its international gangs and the sudden power vacuum that's created when the head of London's most powerful crime family is assassinated.

name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
summary_text: The movie, based on Marvel Comics, will focus on Shang-Chi; 'The Master of Kung-Fu'.

name: Jaws
summary_text: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

name: Warrior
summary_text: During the Tong Wars in the late 1800s, Ah Sahm, a martial arts prodigy from China, immigrates to San Francisco and becomes a hatchet man for the most powerful tong in Chinatown.

name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
summary_text: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

name: Six Feet Under
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.

name: Gunsmoke
summary_text: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough and tumble Dodge City.

name: Get Out
summary_text: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

name: There Will Be Blood
summary_text: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

name: Annabelle
summary_text: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.

name: Jojo Rabbit
summary_text: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

name: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
summary_text: This series focuses on the NYPD's Major Case Squad, a force of detectives who investigate high-profile cases, whilst also showing parts of the crime from the criminal's point of view to the audience.

name: Charmed
summary_text: Follows the lives of three sisters who, after the tragic death of their mother, discover they are powerful witches.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
summary_text: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

name: Coco
summary_text: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

name: After We Collided
summary_text: Based on the 2014 romance novel of the same name, this follows the love life of two young adults.

name: Last Man Standing
summary_text: A married father of three tries to maintain his manliness in a world increasingly dominated by women.

name: Kingsman: The Secret Service
summary_text: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

name: Tom and Jerry
summary_text: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

name: His Dark Materials
summary_text: A young girl is destined to liberate her world from the grip of the Magisterium which represses people's ties to magic and their animal spirits known as daemons.

name: Sharp Objects
summary_text: A reporter confronts the psychological demons from her past when she returns to her hometown to cover a violent murder.

name: Intelligence
summary_text: An NSA agent teams up with a computer analyst to form a new cyber crimes unit in the UK's Government Communications Headquarters.

name: Snake Eyes
summary_text: A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.

name: Resident Alien
summary_text: A crash-landed alien named Harry who takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor and slowly begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his secret mission on Earth.

name: Marvel's M.O.D.O.K.
summary_text: It centers around an egomaniacal supervillain with a really big head and a really little body, who struggles to maintain control of his evil organization and his demanding family.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
summary_text: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

name: Young Frankenstein
summary_text: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

name: Archer
summary_text: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

name: The Chi
summary_text: From Emmy® winner Lena Waithe, The Chi is a timely coming-of-age drama series centered on a group of residents who become linked by coincidence but bonded by the need for connection and redemption.

name: Iron Man
summary_text: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

name: The Prestige
summary_text: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

name: Major Crimes
summary_text: The Closer (2005) spin-off series, which follows Captain Raydor of the Los Angeles Police Department.

name: Kong: Skull Island
summary_text: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

name: Murdoch Mysteries
summary_text: In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.

name: Behind Her Eyes
summary_text: It follows Louise, a single mom with a son and a part-time job in a psychiatrist's office. She begins an affair with her boss and strikes up an unlikely friendship with his wife.

name: Saint Maud
summary_text: Follows a pious nurse who becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of her dying patient.

name: The Superdeep
summary_text: A small research team went down below the surface to find out what secret the world's deepest borehole was hiding. What they have found turned out to be the greatest threat in history. And the future of humanity is in their hands.

name: Angel
summary_text: The vampire Angel, cursed with a soul, moves to Los Angeles and aids people with supernatural-related problems while questing for his own redemption.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary_text: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Boy Meets World
summary_text: An adolescent with two siblings tests his various theories about life as he endures the trials of growing up alongside a good friend.

name: The Beast Must Die
summary_text: Following the death of her son in a hit and run, all Frances Cairnes wants is to hunt down and kill the man she believes is responsible. When she finally tracks him down, she tricks her way into his house and plots his murder from within.

name: Orphan
summary_text: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

name: American Pie
summary_text: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

name: Insidious
summary_text: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

name: Deep Impact
summary_text: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

name: The Night Manager
summary_text: The night manager of a Cairo hotel is recruited to infiltrate an arms dealer's inner circle.

name: Pride & Prejudice
summary_text: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

name: Death Note
summary_text: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

name: Jurassic World
summary_text: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

name: Brokeback Mountain
summary_text: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

name: The Haunting of Hill House
summary_text: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

name: Before We Die
summary_text: Detective Hannah Laing becomes deeply conflicted when she discovers her son is playing a crucial role as an undercover informant in a brutal murder investigation.

name: The Intouchables
summary_text: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

name: Longmire
summary_text: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

name: Generation
summary_text: Ensemble dramedy centering on a group of high school students exploring their sexuality in a modern world.

name: Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker
summary_text: In the riveting conclusion of the landmark Skywalker saga, new legends will be born-and the final battle for freedom is yet to come.

name: Naruto
summary_text: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

name: We're the Millers
summary_text: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Legally Blonde
summary_text: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

name: Troy
summary_text: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

name: It Chapter Two
summary_text: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
summary_text: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
summary_text: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

name: Plan B
summary_text: Follows a straight-laced high school student and her slacker best friend who, after a regrettable first sexual encounter, have 24 hours to hunt down a Plan B pill in America's heartland.

name: Blindspotting
summary_text: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

name: The Irishman
summary_text: Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family.

name: The Hangover
summary_text: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

name: Black Swan
summary_text: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

name: Jumanji: The Next Level
summary_text: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

name: Deadwood
summary_text: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

name: The Killing
summary_text: A police investigation, the saga of a grieving family, and a Seattle mayoral campaign all interlock after the body of 17-year-old Rosie Larsen is found in the trunk of a submerged car.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
summary_text: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

name: No Sudden Move
summary_text: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.

name: The Boss Baby: Family Business
summary_text: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

name: Ready Player One
summary_text: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

name: Elite Short Stories: Carla Samuel
summary_text: Samuel attempts a big, romantic gesture at the airport in order to persuade Carla not to board her flight to London.

name: Fargo
summary_text: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Shiva Baby
summary_text: At a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student runs into her sugar daddy.

name: Mulholland Dr.
summary_text: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

name: Requiem for a Dream
summary_text: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

name: Arrival
summary_text: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

name: Battlestar Galactica
summary_text: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.

name: Eighth Grade
summary_text: An introverted teenage girl tries to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth grade year before leaving to start high school.

name: Almost Famous
summary_text: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

name: Not Another Teen Movie
summary_text: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

name: Eden
summary_text: It follows the disappearance of a young woman which triggers a devastating chain of events which lays bare the dark, hidden heart of paradise.

name: Werewolves Within
summary_text: Feature adaptation of the video game where werewolves attack a small town.

name: Locke & Key
summary_text: After their father is murdered under mysterious circumstances, the three Locke siblings and their mother move into their ancestral home, Keyhouse, which they discover is full of magical keys that may be connected to their father's death.

name: Watchmen
summary_text: Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.

name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
summary_text: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

name: Unforgotten
summary_text: London detectives investigate crimes from the past, unravelling secrets left buried for years.

name: Mother!
summary_text: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

name: Spider-Man
summary_text: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

name: 12 Angry Men
summary_text: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

name: La La Land
summary_text: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

name: 28 Days Later...
summary_text: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

name: The Full Monty
summary_text: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

name: Girl From Nowhere
summary_text: A mysterious, clever girl named Nanno transfers to different schools, exposing the lies and misdeeds of the students and faculty at every turn.

name: Grown Ups 2
summary_text: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and four hundred costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

name: Venom
summary_text: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

name: Cherry
summary_text: Cherry drifts from college dropout to army medic in Iraq - anchored only by his true love, Emily. But after returning from the war with PTSD, his life spirals into drugs and crime as he struggles to find his place in the world.

name: Solos
summary_text: Seven unique character-driven stories. Each character will set off on a thrilling adventure in an uncertain future and they'll come to reckon that even during our most isolated moments, we are all connected through the human experience.

name: Boogie Nights
summary_text: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
